Boasting a garden and free WiFi throughout the property, Hostal Casa portia is situated in Capurganá. The hostel has family rooms.

Casa Portia is situated in an excellent neighbourhood of the town of Capurgana, surrounded by beautiful houses. Everything in town, including the beaches, is on a 5-10 min walk from the hotel.

In Casa Portia we offer private family rooms of various capacities. The rooms have air conditioning and fans, windows and private bathrooms.

You can reach Capurgana by boat from Acandi, Necocli or Turbo. Casa Portia is on a short walking distance from everywhere in Capurgana, we are only 5 min walk from the main square and 10 min walk from the beach.

description.description: Casa Portia is a beautiful hostel full of light and positive energy. It is a special place to rest and to enjoy the tranquillity. Everything is new, clean and comfortable. Lodging in Capurganá collided. PORTIA HOUSE HOSTEL. At the hostel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. At Hostal Casa portia, the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom.
